data.description:
This app offers 4 unique modes designed to enhance your mind-body connection:

1. AUDIO-REACTIVITY:
Put on your headset, play your favorite music, and let the environment come alive with every beat and sound. Watch as the world around you transforms, shifting as you switch environments on the fly. Simultaneously run your custom breathing algorithm alongside an external audio source to create a deeply personal and harmonious journey that balances breath, sound, and space.

2. BREATHING:
Take control of your experience by designing your own breathing algorithms. Watch the virtual environment morph and respond to your unique patterns of inhalation and exhalation. Tweak the visuals to match the pace and rhythm of your breath, empowering you to craft the perfect meditative state.

3. MEDITATION:
Turn off all sounds and immerse yourself in a smooth, calming transformation within the virtual space. Enjoy the serene visual flow as you meditate in silence, allowing the environmentâ€™s gentle changes to guide you deeper into relaxation.

4. GAMEMODE:
Imagine your stress manifesting as parasitic enemies that seek to drain energy from your inner core. Eliminate these foes using powerful weapons like long swords or plasma emitters. Collect breathing points, build resilience, and defend your core as you transform stress into empowerment.

Turn on the music, breathe, and embrace the future of meditation.
